choices.text:
when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now?
Your sister's age can be calculated by subtracting your current age (80) from the difference between her age and your sister's original age when you were both six years old. 
So, your sister's age = 6 - ((32 + 12) / 2) = 45. Therefore, your sister is now 45 years old.
